modName: Black Swordsman Gutts Armour and sword Saved Game
summary:
- REQUIRES DAWNGUARD -

A Saved game - Breton with Berserk anime Armour( same as Black Swordsman Armour) and the Sword - Dragonslayer.

Along with Better males - Underwear Default and Faces - GeonoxFaces.
descriptionHtml:
-Saved game - Breton with Berserk anime Armour( same as Black Swordsman Armour) and the Sword - Dragonslayer.

Along with Better males - Underwear Default and Faces - GeonoxFaces.
------------------------
Like i said in smaller desciption, this is a saved game with the Berserk Armour and sword.
with the addition of Better males - Underwear Default and Faces - GeonoxFaces modifications. 
-------------------------
